Introduction

Welcome to Phase 01 of the ZAC project. This is where it all begins, so if you don’t know what the hell’s going on, don’t stress, you’re in the right place.

Phase 01 is about building a functional POC (proof of concept) of ZAC. This serves two purposes. First is to give us a bird-eye view of ZAC as a system of hardware and software, working together. Second purpose is to make sure we’re not crazy to even attempt building it, because the jury’s still out on that one.

item.title: ZACLOG/00.00 - The Zombie Apocalypse Computer
item.description:
Or, the Zero-Infrastructure Autonomous Computer, if you prefer.

ZAC is a self-contained, open-source survival computer designed to function completely off-grid.

Built around a Raspberry Pi architecture, ZAC lives in a weatherproof Pelican case. Solar and battery powered. No internet required. No cloud dependencies. No subscriptions. A standalone, civilization-in-a-box machine, constructed to outlast the zombie apocalypse.
